title: Bane of the Dragon King
description: The Dragon King lives, a the sudden loss of the only two heirs who could have saved Fallhollow, has plunged the land into war and utter chaos. Hope for even a small victory seems dismal until Charlotte surprises everyone, including herself, with a secret that could change the course of the war and topple the impervious Dragon King.Armed with the power to set the world right, Charlotte embarks on a perilous journey with the sly and cunning Prince Izmayel Ascatar Venniver IV- Lord of the peaceful Edryd dragons - to confer with the Edryd’s king, Drak. But things don’t go as planned. Charlotte is captured and used as a pawn in an intricate plot to destroy Hirth and claim the universe by a loathsome and familiar enemy.As Fallhollow and the kingdom of Hirth begin to fall, David schemes in secret to engineer the downfall of the Dragon King, rescue Charlotte, and return the kingdom to its former glory. Mask of the Dragon King is the final dramatic and magnificent conclusion to the Chronicles of Fallhollow Trilogy.
author: J. Keller Ford
